verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> upon a land <S%H776><s%>, if the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of their coasts <S%H7097><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him for their watchman <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%>:

If when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, he blow <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, and warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>;

Then whosoever <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, and taketh not warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; if the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and take him away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>.

He heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, and took not warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon him. But he that taketh warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8737><s%> shall deliver <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.

But if the watchman <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and blow <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> be not warned <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; if the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> from among them, he is taken away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the watchman's <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

So thou, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee a watchman <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; therefore thou shalt hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them from me.

When I say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, thou shalt surely <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; if thou dost not speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%>, that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> at thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Nevertheless, if thou warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of his way <S%H1870><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from it; if he do not turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Therefore, O thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; Thus ye speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> and our sins <S%H2403><s%> be upon us, and we pine away <S%H4743><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in them, how should we then live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto them, As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, I have no pleasure <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; but that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%> and live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>; for why will ye die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

Therefore, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his transgression <S%H6588><s%>: as for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, he shall not fall <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8735><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he turneth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; neither shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for his righteousness in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he sinneth <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

When I shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, that he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8800><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; if he trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to his own righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and commit <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, all his righteousnesses <S%H6666><s%> shall not be remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; but for his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that he hath committed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for it.

Again, when I say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Thou shalt surely <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; if he turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which is Torahful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>;

If the wicked <S%H7563><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the pledge <S%H2258><s%>, give again <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that he had robbed <S%H1500><s%>, walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, without committing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>; he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8800><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, he shall not die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

None of his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he hath committed <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> shall be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him: he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which is Torahful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>; he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8800><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the YY <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: but as for them, their way <S%H1870><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

When the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turneth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and committeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, he shall even die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thereby.

But if the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7564><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which is Torahful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>, he shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereby.

Yet ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the YY <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%> <S%H8735><s%>. O ye house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, I will judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you every one <S%H376><s%> after his ways <S%H1870><s%>.

And it came to pass in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity <S%H1546><s%>, in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, in the fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that one that had escaped <S%H6412><s%> out of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The city <S%H5892><s%> is smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8717><s%>.

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was upon me in the evening <S%H6153><s%>, afore <S%H6440><s%> he that was escaped <S%H6412><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and had opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, until he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to me in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> was opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and I was no more dumb <S%H481><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, they that inhabit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> those wastes <S%H2723><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Avraham <S%H85><s%> was one <S%H259><s%>, and he inherited <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: but we are many <S%H7227><s%>; the land <S%H776><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8738><s%> us for inheritance <S%H4181><s%>.

Wherefore say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> toward your idols <S%H1544><s%>, and shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: and shall ye possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> ?

Ye stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon your sword <S%H2719><s%>, ye work <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%>, and ye defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>: and shall ye possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> ?

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou thus unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; As I live <S%H2416><s%>, surely they that are in the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and him that is in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> to be devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and they that be in the forts <S%H4679><s%> and in the caves <S%H4631><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

For I will lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> most <S%H4923><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of her strength <S%H5797><s%> shall cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that none shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>, when I have laid <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> most <S%H4923><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> because of all their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they have committed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Also, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> still are talking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8737><s%> against <S%H681><s%> thee by the walls <S%H7023><s%> and in the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the houses <S%H1004><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> one <S%H2297><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> to his brother <S%H251><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> what is the word <S%H1697><s%> that cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And they come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee as the people <S%H5971><s%> cometh <S%H3996><s%>, and they sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee as my people <S%H5971><s%>, and they hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>, but they will not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: for with their mouth <S%H6310><s%> they shew <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> much love <S%H5690><s%>, but their heart <S%H3820><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their covetousness <S%H1215><s%>.

And, lo, thou art unto them as a very lovely <S%H5690><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> of one that hath a pleasant <S%H3303><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, and can play well <S%H2895><s%> <S%H8688><s%> on an instrument <S%H5059><s%> <S%H8763><s%>: for they hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>, but they do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them not.

And when this cometh to pass <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, (lo, it will come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>,) then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> hath been among <S%H8432><s%> them.
